title: Peter's Journey into Tech
description: I was skeptical about trying my way around into tech. I initially did retail jobs, customer service, and ran errands, basically anything that could give me money. My friend one day suggested me to try entering the tech industry, for obvious reasons, one being the money and the other was my problem solving skills.....
